title: The Last Alliance of Elves and Men (1R49)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Tale. Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. Limit 1 per bearer. Bearer is strength +1 for each Elf you can spot (limit +3).
Lore:	“But Sauron of Mordor assailed them, and they made the Last Alliance of Elves and Men, and the hosts of Gil-galad and Elendil were mustered….”
Rarity:	R
